title: An unexpected error occured while logging in.
body: Couldnt log in. I tried rebooting the router and turning off the firewall but both didnt work.

replies.body: An Unexpected Error is a sign that the client isn't able to Connect to the Server to obtain the data! Running through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) should stabilize that connection and get you back in the game. Make sure to reach back out to me if you do run into any issues.
After the patch it just stops at authenticating, please help.
